Correction procedure: Linear regression models for segmental context effects defined for each native language and cue name.
Purpose: Corrects cues for segmental context effects such as the presence of nasals and rhotics.
Fitted with: Native spoken /d/ and /t/ test words (English database: Li & Xie (2020); Swedish: native talker)

Correction procedure: Linear regression model for suprasegmental context effects defined for each Native Language.
Purpose: Corrects for effects of word length and stress
